message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

The paper deals with the problem of hand pose estimation from single depth images, which is a computer vision problem. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The proposed method involves the use of deep convolutional networks and fully-connected regressors, which are common techniques in machine learning and artificial intelligence, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another likely sub-category. The use of data augmentation and smooth L1 loss also suggests the possibility of the paper belonging to cs.LG (Machine Learning). The problem of hand pose estimation can also be considered a robotics problem, which makes cs.RO (Robotics) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper involves the detection of fingertips and human pose, which suggests the possibility of it belonging to cs.GR (Graphics).
